StarCluster
Package starcluster :: Module image :: Class ImageCreator
[hide private]
[frames] | no frames]

Class ImageCreator

source code

Base class for S3/EBS Image Creators. Handles fetching the host and setting up a connection object as well as setting common attributes (description, kernel_id, ramdisk_id)

easy_ec2 must be an awsutils.EasyEC2 object

instance_id is the id of the instance to be imaged

key_location must point to the private key file corresponding to the keypair used to launch instance_id
